definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]

sentences.english: I was annoyed when Dan scratched my car.
sentences.chinese: 我很气阿丹刮花了我的车子。

sentences.english: Lucy talked Dan out of skipping class.
Dan was fired because he misbehaved.
sentences.chinese: 阿丹因为行为不端被开除。

sentences.english: Recite to them the truth of the story of the two sons of Adam.
sentences.chinese: 你当如实地对他们讲述阿丹的两个儿子的故事。

sentences.english: Every one of the children of Adam (A. S. ) must realize this.
sentences.chinese: 每个阿丹的子孙都必须了解这点。

sentences.english: We, the children of Adam (A. S. ), must understand this.
sentences.chinese: 我们，阿丹的子孙，必须要知道这些。

sentences.english: He is the best of the sons of Adam.
sentences.chinese: 他是阿丹后裔中最优秀的。

sentences.english: Dan is quick at chopping vegetables.
Shawn and Dan snuck into the baseball stadium.
sentences.chinese: 尚恩和阿丹偷偷溜进了棒球场中。

sentences.english: I guess you and Dan should stay away from that one.
sentences.chinese: 我想你跟阿丹应该离那个洞远一点。

definition: Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God/also written 穆罕默德
Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God
Suleiman (name)/General Michel Suleiman (1948-), Lebanese military man and politician, president of Lebanon 2008-2014
Abby or Abi (name, sometimes short for Abigail)
